New Lynda.com Video Course - Swift & Reusable Frameworks

Posted by David Okun on November 27, 2017

For the past few months, I’ve been putting together a video course on how to write Swift code in a truly unique way - a reusable framework.

Having worked on a few SDKs before, I love thinking about working on things in a reusable way, and being able to ship frameworks and developer tools is a lot of fun. Here’s a preview video for the course:

Swift: Writing Reusable Frameworks by David Okun

The course is very heavily based on the work I’ve done with Lumina so far, and I hope these principles encourage you to try and write your own framework as well!!

The course is behind a paywall, but I can definitely vouch for the quality of other courses on Lynda, which is now LinkedIn Learning. Give it a shot, and let me know if you enjoy the course!!
